mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feihua_records (user_id, player_name, score, mode, difficulty, keywords_used, play_date, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{playerName}, #{score}, #{mode}, #{difficulty}, #{keywordsUsed}, #{playDate}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT player_name as playerName, MAX(score) as score, mode, difficulty, DATE(created_at) as achievedAt FROM feihua_records GROUP BY player_name, mode, difficulty ORDER BY MAX(score) DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT COUNT(*) + 1 FROM ( SELECT MAX(score) as max_score FROM feihua_records WHERE user_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY user_id ) t WHERE t.max_score > ( SELECT MAX(score) FROM feihua_records WHERE user_id = #{userId} )
SELECT feihua_best_score FROM user WHERE UID = #{userId}
SELECT feihua_total_games FROM user WHERE UID = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET feihua_best_score = #{score} WHERE UID = #{userId}
UPDATE user SET feihua_total_games = feihua_total_games + 1 WHERE UID = #{userId}
UPDATE user SET feihua_achievements = #{achievements} WHERE UID = #{userId}
